selected_links.title: View Planning Applications
strengths: Provides a way for users to view current planning applications in the area.
User can search by application number, address or applicant name.
selected_links.reasoning: This link appears to be directly related to council customer information needs as it provides access to existing planning applications which can help users stay informed about construction projects in their neighborhood. The user-friendly search function increases the relevance of the resource.

context.need: I'd like to install solar panels on my house and want to know if I need permission to have someone undertake this work.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: Understand if permission is needed to install solar panels on my house and the steps I should take to undertake this work
Reason.answer_quality: The content provides no direct answer for solar panel installation. It suggests looking up planning applications instead.
Reason.reasoning: The content does not contain any detail about obtaining permission for installing solar panels or the process involved. Its focus is on viewing and commenting on planning applications.
Reason.next_actions: Search for planning-related permissions, possibly contact the council directly to confirm if approval is needed for solar panel installation.

Reason.need: Identify who to contact for permission to install solar panels
Reason.answer_quality: The content does not provide information about who to contact for obtaining permission.
Reason.reasoning: There is no mention of relevant departments or contacts related to solar panel installation permissions in the provided content.
Reason.next_actions: Contact the council directly for assistance on obtaining approval for solar panel installation.

Reason.need: Learn about the time it will take to get permission
Reason.answer_quality: The content does not provide information on the time taken for obtaining permission.
Reason.reasoning: No details or estimated timelines regarding obtaining approval for solar panel installation can be found in the provided content.
Reason.next_actions: Reach out to the council for more accurate information on the time it might take to get permission.

Reason.need: Provide guidance if help is needed
Reason.answer_quality: The content does not provide any specific help or contact for solar panel installation-related queries.
Reason.reasoning: There are no resources or contacts detailed in the provided content to seek help with solar panel installation procedures and permissions.
Reason.next_actions: Reach out to energy providers, renewable energy organizations, or local government offices for assistance in installing solar panels.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content does not provide sufficient information on the specific need of obtaining approval for solar panel installation. Key gaps include details about the process, who to contact, timeframes involved, and help resources available. Overall satisfaction level is low for someone seeking information on a council-related residential service.
